snippet: The United Methodist Church voted against two proposals on Wednesday to divest from companies that provide equipment used by Israel to enforce its control in the occupied territories.
abstract: United Methodist Church, America's largest mainline Protestant denomination, votes against two proposals to divest from companies that provide equipment used by Israel to enforce its control in the occupied territories.
lead_paragraph: The United Methodist Church voted against two proposals on Wednesday to divest from companies that provide equipment used by Israel to enforce its control in the occupied territories.

headline.seo: Methodists Vote Against Ending Investments Tied to Israel
headline.main: Methodists Vote Against Ending Investments Tied to Israel
headline.print_headline: Methodists Vote Against Ending Investments Tied to Israel
